00003 /**
00004  * @brief Lookup class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used to connect to retrieve lookup tables from a database.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Lookup

00014  */
00015 
00016 class Boo_Lookup extends Boo_Db {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief Class instantance cache.
00020      * Keeps DB requests to a minimum.
00021      */
00022     protected $cache = false;
00023     
00024     protected $orderBy = array();
00025     
00026     /**
00027      * @brief Default constructor.
00028      * 
00029      * Handles shorthand object initialization.
00030      * 
00031      * @param string $tableName[optional] The table name.
00032      * @param string $primaryKey[optional] The primary key.
00033      * @return void.
00034      */
00035     public function __construct($tableName = false, $primaryKey = false) {
00036         // set constructor values, using the shorthand form
00037         if ($tableName !== false) {
00038             $this->setTableName($tableName);
00039         }
00040         
00041         if ($primaryKey !== false) {
00042             $this->setPrimaryKey($primaryKey);
00043         }
00044     }
00045     
00046     public function getOrderBySql() {
00047         if (empty($this->orderBy)) {
00048             return false;
00049         }
00050         
00051         $sql = 'ORDER BY ';
00052         foreach ($this->orderBy as $key => $value) {
00053             $sql .= "{$key} {$value}, ";
00054         }
00055         
00056         // remove last comma and space
00057         $sql = rtrim($sql, ', ');
00058         
00059         
00060         
00061         return $sql;
00062     }
00063     
00064     public function getOrderBy() { return $this->orderBy; }
00065     
00066     public function setOrderBy($columnName, $direction = 'ASC') {
00067         $this->clearOrderBy();
00068         return $this->addOrderBy($columnName, $direction);
00069     }
00070     
00071     public function clearOrderBy() {
00072         $this->orderBy = array();
00073         return true;
00074     }
00075     
00076     public function addOrderBy($columnName, $direction = 'ASC') {
00077         $columnName = trim($columnName);
00078         $direction = strtoupper(trim($direction));
00079         
00080         if (!Boo_Validator::isSqlSafe($columnName)) {
00081             trigger_error("Column {$columnName} is not valid, SQL injection detected", E_USER_ERROR);
00082             return false;
00083         }
00084         
00085         if (!Boo_Validator::isSqlDirection($direction)) {
00086             trigger_error("Direction {$direction} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00087             return false;
00088         }
00089         
00090         if (array_key_exists($columnName, $this->orderBy)) {
00091             trigger_error("Column {$columnName} already exists, overwriting", E_USER_NOTICE);
00092         }
00093         
00094         $this->orderBy[$columnName] = $direction;
00095         return true;
00096     }
00097     
00098     public function removeOrderBy($columnName) {
00099         $columnName = trim($columnName);
00100         
00101         if (array_key_exists($columnName, $this->orderBy)) {
00102             unset($this->orderBy[$columnName]);
00103             return true;
00104         } else {
00105             trigger_error("Column {$columnName} was not found", E_USER_NOTICE);
00106             return false;
00107         }
00108     }
00109     
00110     public function open($useCache = true) {
00111         if ($this->beforeOpen() === false) {
00112             return false;
00113         }
00114         
00115         // cache is set no need to open again
00116         if ($this->cache and $userCache) {
00117             return true;
00118         }
00119         
00120         $result = false;
00121         // open and fill cache
00122         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
00123         
00124         $columns = '*';
00125         $sql = trim("SELECT {$columns} FROM {$this->tableName} " . $this->getOrderBySql());
00126         $stmt = $dbh->prepare($sql);
00127         
00128         try {
00129             $stmt->execute();
00130             $results = $stmt->fetchAll(PDO::FETCH_ASSOC); // returns array
00131             if (empty($results)) {
00132                 trigger_error('No results found', E_USER_NOTICE);
00133                 $result = false;
00134             } else {
00135                 $result = true;
00136                 $this->cache = $results;
00137             }
00138         } catch (Exception $e) {
00139             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00140             return false;
00141         }
00142         
00143         if ($this->afterOpen($result) === false) {
00144             return false;
00145         }
00146         //echo $sql; // usefull for debugging
00147         return $result;
00148     }
00149

00151      * @brief Called before Boo_Lookup::open().

00153      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.

00155     protected function beforeOpen() {
00156         return true;
00157     }

00162      * @param bool $result The result of Boo_Lookup::open().
00163      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE unless overridden by parent class.
00164      */
00165     protected function afterOpen($result) {
00166         return true;
00167     }

00169     /**
00170      * @brief Close the object.
00171      * 
00172      * Provides API function for future implementation.
00173      * 
00174      * @todo Implement this function and preform cleanup.
00175      * @return bool Always returns TRUE.
00176      */
00177     public function close() {
00178         if ($this->beforeClose() === false) {
00179             return false;
00180         }
00181         
00182         $result = true;
00183         // put cleanup code here
00184         
00185         if ($this->afterClose($result) === false) {
00186             return false;
00187         }
00188         return true;
00189     }

00210     public function clearCache() {
00211         $this->cache = false;
00212         return true;
00213     }

00216     public function getAssocArray($key, $value) {
00217         $key = trim($key);
00218         $value = trim($value);
00219         
00220         if (!$this->isField($key)) {
00221             trigger_error("Field {$key} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00222             return false;
00223         }
00224         
00225         if (!$this->isField($value)) {
00226             trigger_error("Field {$value} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00227             return false;
00228         }
00229         
00230         $data = array();
00231         if ($this->hasCache()) {
00232             foreach ($this->cache as $item) {
00233                 $data[$item[$key]] = $item[$value];
00234             }
00235         } else {
00236             trigger_error('Cache is empty, try Boo_Lookup::open() first', E_USER_WARNING);
00237             return false;
00238         }
00239         return $data;
00240     }
00241     
00242     public function getArray($value) {
00243         
00244         if (!$this->isField($value)) {
00245             trigger_error("Field {$value} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00246             return false;
00247         }
00248         
00249         $data = array();
00250         
00251         if ($this->hasCache()) {
00252             foreach ($this->cache as $item) {
00253                 $data[] = $item[$value];
00254             }
00255         } else {
00256             trigger_error('Cache is empty, try Boo_Lookup::open() first', E_USER_WARNING);
00257             return false;
00258         }
00259         return $data;
00260         
00261     }

00263     
00264     public function htmlSelect($key, $value, $attrs = array()) {
00265         $data = $this->getSelectData($key, $value);
00266         
00267         $select = new Boo_Html_Select;
00268         $select->setAttr('name', $this->tableName); // good default value
00269         $select->setAttr('id', $this->tableName); // good default value
00270         $select->applyAttrs($attrs); // override defaults
00271         $select->setData($data);
00272         
00273         return $select;
00274     }
00275     
00276     public function getSelectData($key, $value) {
00277         return $this->getAssocArray($key, $value);
00278     }
00279     
00280     public function isField($field) {
00281         $field = trim($field);
00282         if ($this->hasCache()) {
00283             $firstRow = $this->cache[0];
00284             return array_key_exists($field, $firstRow);
00285         } else {
00286             trigger_error('Cache is empty, try Boo_Lookup::open() first', E_USER_WARNING);
00287             return false;
00288         }
00289     }
00290     
00291     public function isFieldValue($field, $value) {
00292         $field = trim($field);
00293         $value = trim($value);
00294         
00295         if (!$this->isField($field)) {
00296             trigger_error("Field {$field} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00297             return false;
00298         }
00299         
00300         if ($this->hasCache()) {
00301             foreach ($this->cache as $item) {
00302                 if ($item[$field] == $value) {
00303                     return true;
00304                 }
00305             }
00306         } else {
00307             trigger_error('Cache is empty, try Boo_Lookup::open() first', E_USER_WARNING);
00308             return false;
00309         }
00310         return false;
00311     }
00312     
00313     public function isPrimaryKey($value) {
00314         return $this->isFieldValue($this->primaryKey, $value);
00315     }
00316     
00317     public function getPrimaryKeyByField($field, $value) {
00318         $field = trim($field);
00319         $value = trim($value);
00320         
00321         if (!$this->isField($field)) {
00322             trigger_error("Field {$field} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00323             return false;
00324         }
00325         
00326         if ($this->hasCache()) {
00327             foreach ($this->cache as $item) {
00328                 if ($item[$field] == $value) {
00329                     return $item[$this->primaryKey];
00330                 }
00331             }
00332         } else {
00333             trigger_error('Cache is empty, try Boo_Lookup::open() first', E_USER_WARNING);
00334             return false;
00335         }
00336         
00337         trigger_error("Field {$field} with value {$value} was not found", E_USER_NOTICE);
00338         return false;
00339     }
00340     
00341     public function getFieldByPrimaryKey($primaryKey, $field) {
00342         $field = trim($field);
00343         $primaryKey = trim($primaryKey);
00344         
00345         
00346         if (!$this->isPrimaryKey($primaryKey)) {
00347             trigger_error("Primary key {$primaryKey} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00348             return false;
00349         }
00350         
00351         if (!$this->isField($field)) {
00352             trigger_error("Field {$field} is not valid", E_USER_WARNING);
00353             return false;
00354         }
00355         
00356         if ($this->hasCache()) {
00357             foreach ($this->cache as $item) {
00358                 if ($item[$this->primaryKey] == $primaryKey) {
00359                     return $item[$field];
00360                 }
00361             }
00362         } else {
00363             trigger_error('Cache is empty, try Boo_Lookup::open() first', E_USER_WARNING);
00364             return false;
00365         }
00366         
00367         trigger_error("Field {$field} with primary key {$primaryKey} was not found", E_USER_NOTICE);
00368         return false;
00369     }
00370     
00371     
00372     public function hasCache() { return !empty($this->cache); }
00373     
00374     public function getCache() { return $this->cache; }
00375     
00376     public function setCache($cache) {
00377         if (empty($cache)) {
00378             if (BOO_DEBUG) { trigger_error('Cache is empty', E_USER_NOTICE); }
00379         }
00380         
00381         $this->cache = $cache;
00382         return true;
00383     }

00385     public function htmlCachePre($attrs = array()) {
00386         $pre = new Boo_Html_Pre;
00387         $pre->applyAttrs($attrs);
00388         $pre->setContent(print_r($this->cache, true));
00389         
00390         return $pre;
